Window

Class PlayPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Support.mvc.TView
      • Support.navigator.TPage
        • Window.JFXPage
          • Window.PlayPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IView, IPage, IPlayPage

    public class PlayPage
extends JFXPage
implements IPlayPage
    Object instance of this class is responsible for the initialisation and draw of graphical component displayed on play page. Contains the implementation of application page/view component specified by ISettingsPage interface. The class extends the JFXPage javaFX specific abstract page class.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey
